author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Truecar Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.05
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Truecar Inc:
* TRUECAR REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.08 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 12 PERCENT TO $83.1 MILLION * SAYS UNITS ARE EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF 230,000 UNITS TO 235,000 UNITS IN Q1
* SAYS Q1 REVENUES ARE EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $80 MILLION TO $82 MILLION.
* SAYS FY UNITS ARE EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF 1,030,000 UNITS TO 1,050,000 UNITS
* SAYS FY REVENUES ARE EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $360 MILLION TO $365 MILLION
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.00, REVENUE VIEW $81.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $362.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
